description: Lists the resources registered to be managed by the Data Catalog.

parameters.name: FilterConditionList
parameters.description: Any applicable row-level and/or column-level filtering conditions for the resources. (dict) --- This structure describes the filtering of columns in a table based on a filter condition. Field (string) --- The field to filter in the filter condition. ComparisonOperator (string) --- The comparison operator used in the filter condition. StringValueList (list) --- A string with values used in evaluating the filter condition. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Field
nested_params.description: The field to filter in the filter condition.

nested_params.name: ComparisonOperator
nested_params.description: The comparison operator used in the filter condition.

nested_params.name: StringValueList
nested_params.description: A string with values used in evaluating the filter condition.

nested_items.name: ResourceInfoList
nested_items.description: A summary of the data lake resources.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The IAM role that registered a resource.

nested_items.name: LastModified
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource was last modified.

nested_items.name: WithFederation
nested_items.description: Whether or not the resource is a federated resource.

nested_items.name: HybridAccessEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the data access of tables pointing to the location can be managed by both Lake Formation permissions as well as Amazon S3 bucket policies.

nested_items.name: WithPrivilegedAccess
nested_items.description: Grants the calling principal the permissions to perform all supported Lake Formation operations on the registered data location.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token, if this is not the first call to retrieve these resources.
